alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Madison and Beaverhead Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North Fork to 9 miles east of Jackson to 12 miles north of Lima. Movement was east northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Sheridan, Virginia City, Twin Bridges, Lima, Alder, Jackson, Wisdom, Silver Star, Dell, Grant, Bannack Pass, Melrose, Wise River, Dewey, Bannack, Laurin, Glen, Snowline and Beaverhead Rock State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 5 and 94 . Highway 287 between mile markers 24 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Montana.
